transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2 Ally Team Speed each turn (Max 5 stacks)
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
+25 Action Points at battle start
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
At the start of battle, grants increased Speed for 1 turn
+50 Accuracy

SKT_FIRST.name: Surge
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to reduce cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Luminous Wind</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>. When the target is a Boss or when the target is defeated, the effect chance is doubled. This skill ignores 30% of the target's Defense.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Inflicts Unbuffable on the target for 2 turns (Ignores the target's Resilience)

description: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000097_1_4]</color> chance toÂ reduce cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Luminous Wind</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>. When the target is a Boss or when the target is defeated, the effect chance is doubled. This skill ignores 30% of the target's Defense.

SKT_SECOND.name: Aero Mana
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect)
Increases damage dealt of all attacks proportional to Speed.

(Active Effect)
After using Surge, activates <color=#ffd732>Rampaging Strike</color> on the enemy with the highest Speed.

<color=#ffd732>Rampaging Strike</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance each to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description:
(Passive Effect)
Increases damage dealt of all attacks proportional to Speed.

(Active Effect)
After using Surge, activates <color=#ffd732>Rampaging Strike</color> on the enemy with the highest Speed.

<color=#ffd732>Rampaging Strike</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000097_2_3]</color> chance each to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000097_2_3] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Luminous Wind
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>. When the target is a Boss or when the target is defeated, increases Priority of the ally with the highest Attack by an additional <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy, and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000097_3_1]</color>. When the target is a Boss or when the target is defeated, increases Priority of the ally with the highest Attack by an additional <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000097_3_2]</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Ignores 30% of the target's Defense.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000097_chain_1_1]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Ignores 30% of the target's Defense.
